column1: නිර්වේශය :-
1993-06-24 දිනැති අංක 772/22 දරන අති වි්‍වශෂ ගැසට් නිවවදනය අනුව පරිසර

සංවවදී  කලාපය  තුල 
වමම 
අධිකාරිවේ  නිර්වේශයකින් 
වතාරව 
වාණිජ
ක්ෂ්‍රියාකාරකමක්ෂ  වන  මහා  පරිමාන  ගබඩා  සංකීර්ණවේ  ඉදිකිරීම  පිළිබඳව  හා  ඒ
සඳහා  කඩුවවල  මහ  නගරසභාව  හා  නාගරික  සංවර්ධන  අධිකාරිය  අනුමැතිය
ලබාදීම  සම්බන්ධව  එම  ආයතන  වදකද  වගඋත්තරකරු  කර  ව්‍යාපෘති  හිමිකරුට
නීති මඟින් කටයුතු කිරීම සුදුසු බව නිර්වේශ කරමු. (emphasis mine)

Thereafter  the  Central  Environmental  Authority  has 
filed  an

action 
against 
the 
18th 
Respondent-Developer 
under 
the

National  Environmental  Act 
in 
the  Magistrate’s  Court 
of
Kaduwela and upon pleading guilty, he has been imposed a fine

Thereupon 
the  Central  Environmental  Authority  has 
issued

8R11  dated  30.08.2016―a  No  Objection  Letter―subject 
to  a

number  of  conditions,  the 
first  of  which 
is  “The  warehouse
should conform  to  the zoning plan of the  area.”   It is noteworthy
that this letter has been addressed not to the  18th Respondent-

Developer,  but 
to 
the  15th  Respondent―the  Commissioner,

Municipal  Council,  Kaduwela.  As 
I  have  already  stated,  the
warehouse does not conform to the zoning plan of the area.  On
the  other  hand,  it  is  difficult  to  understand  how  even  a  No

can 
thus 
be 
given 
to 
an 
unauthorized 
Objection 
Letter
commercial construction built arbitrarily very close to the Kelani

River  causing  wanton  damage 
to 
the  embankment  of 
the
river―vide X11-X13.   The attention of the Court was not drawn
to  any  provision  of  the  law,  which  empowers  the  Authority  to
issue such letters.

The 
12th 
Respondent―the 
Director 
General 
of 
Irrigation
Department  has  not  filed  objections  to  the  main  application.
